allMovies.title: Mr. Bachchan
allMovies.description: The film is inspired by the real-life income tax raid conducted on Indian industrialist Sardar Inder Singh

allMovies.title: Double iSmart
allMovies.description: Big Bull, a notorious assassin, wants to achieve immortality and decides to transfer his memories to "iSmart" Shankar

trending.title: Saripodhaa Sanivaaram
trending.description: Surya is an insurance agent at NLIC, a public sector firm, struggling with significant anger management issues. As a child, his mother, Chayadevi, made him promise to channel his anger only on one specific day each week

topRated.title: Kalki 2898 AD
topRated.description: Following the Kurukshetra War, Ashwatthama attempts to kill Uttarā's unborn child. For committing the act, Krishna, the 8th avatar of Vishnu, curses him to roam the earth as an immortal and witness humanity's misery as a result of societal and moral deterioration during the Kali Yuga
